Harada has to be the funniest and craziest character in that drama. I can't help but laugh every time he does something nutty. 



  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: BarbaraSheridan 
  To: SHQ@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, June 17, 2004 11:21 AM
  Subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: NHK characterization




  secretary wrote:

  >***according to the ladies at 3-hajime.com there was an amusing 
  >scene where Saitou and Shimada charge at a riceball offered at the 
  >Yagi residence or something along those lines...is this true 
  >Barbara?  I guess being perpetually hungry is the lot of ronin LOL!  
  >When I get more of the series...I am going to have to see this in 
  >slow motion ^_^...in the case of Saitou it should be like fighting 
  >over the last bottle of sake
  >  
  >
  Saitou was there but I think he was being his laid back self. Now  
  Harada and Shimada.(in the episode from last Sunday) definitely dove at 
  the food. Those guys together near food are scary!! LOL

  For anyone whose seen at least the first couple episodes you will recall 
  what a dweeb Todo Heisuke is--well when he wasn't looking Harada reached 
  over and stole his riceball right out of his hand!!  To make matters 
  worse when Okita later spurns the food young Miss Hide saved for him 
  Shimada snags that and there's poor Heisuke with that lok on his face of 
  'hey....what about _me_????"

  -- 
  Barbara Sheridan
  http://www.barbarasheridan.net
